resources.string: The game consists of two teams: the werewolf and his followers, and the villagers (with the jester, who will be explained later on). For a team to win, they must eliminate all the players on the opposing team. Each team has different roles, and each of them has unique abilities that can be used to achieve victory.

The game consists of two phases: night and day. At night, players will use their abilities to attack, survive attacks from the opposing team, gain information, etc. The werewolf team knows who the villagers are and who their teammates are. In contrast, the villagers must figure out who the werewolves are in order to eliminate them. If the werewolf is killed, and it is not the last of his team, a teammate will take his place as the werewolf.

During the day, players will have time (as much as they want, although a timer can be set if desired) to discuss who the werewolves might be (werewolves are encouraged to pretend being villagers) and, at the end of the discussion, players can vote for someone to be put on trial. After his defense, the rest of the players will individually vote on whether they want to eliminate (by hanging) him or not (the player is eliminate if the majority votes so). After that, the round ends, night falls, and a new round begins.
There is one role that plays solo: the jester. The jester wins only by getting himself hanged at the end of the round.
The game starts at night, each player is secretly assigned a role and should perform their actions discreetly (without showing their phone screen to the other players)."

Now you may set a time to discuss to find out who the werewolves are.
 Everyone can comment his role (or lie about it), or comment what ability did he use at night (or lie about it).
 After the set time is completed, all players vote at the same time. If it's a draw, no one is hanged and you shall continue to the next round.
 If someone is selected, he/she has a chance to defend himself and say whatever he wishes.
 After his/her defense, everyone votes at the same time if he wishes to hang the accused player or to save him (thumbs up / thumbs down).
 If the majority wants to hang him, select the player and continue to next round
Belongs to the werewolves team. Every night can select a villager to eliminate
Belongs to the werewolves team. Every night can select a villager to cancel his/her ability
Belongs to the werewolves team. Can select a villager to eliminate at night. Her Ability has 1 turn cooldown and it starts on cooldown
Belongs to the werewolves team. Can select a dead player to revive it as a zombie. His ability has priority over the reviver
Belongs to the werewolves team. Has no ability, but can vote at the end of the round (only appears when revived by necromancer).
Belongs to the werewolves team. At night can spill oil on up to 2 players or ignite. Ignite kills all the players with oil, including the arsonist.
Belongs to the villagers team. Has no ability
Belongs to the villagers team. Can cast a protection barrier on a player at night (protects from all attacks on that turn). The ability has 1 turn cooldown.
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can select a player to revive (werewolves are included and are revived with a werewolf role, choose wisely)
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can select a player to shot to kill(villagers included)
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can stay alert at night (Every player that visits him, will get shot).
Belongs to the villagers team. Has two lives (dies instantly if hanged).Every night can select a player to protect from all attacks he/she receives.

Belongs to the villagers team. At night can hide into a player\'s house. All the abilities that target him directly have no effect. Both he and his host receive the abilities targeted to the host. If he hides in the house of werewolf, he is attacked.

Belongs to the villagers team. At night can set the bomb in a player\'s house . When the detonator dies, the bomb explodes, striking the target player. The Detonator may change the bomb to other location. If he dies in the same night when he set the bomb, the ability has no effect.

Belongs to the villagers team. At night can stalk a player, the next round will be revealed to him ONE player that visited or was visited by target player (if there was any). If it\'s revealed to him that the targeted player visited or was visited by the stalker, this means that the target player visited the stalker
Belongs to the villagers team. At night can investigate. The next day 3 players will be revealed to him. At least one of them is a werewolf.
Belongs to the villagers team. Appears as a werewolf teammate secretly. If a werewolf uses an ability over a teammate, it will have no effect (so werewolves don\'t kill each other).
Plays alone. Has no ability. His objective is to be hanged at the end of any round.
